name: Starter Deck Rework
description:
Starter Deck Rework reworks the starter deck of each vanilla character, making them more balanced and unique.

Changes:

- Ironclad has 1 Strike removed and 1 Frenzy (Lose 2HP, Gain 2 Strength) added

- Silent has 1 Strike and 1 Defend removed

- Strike+ and Defend+ are now unique for each character:

- Ironclad:

- Strike+: Deal 8 damage. Next turn, gain 1 Energy.

- Defend+: Gain 5 block for each enemy in combat.

- Silent:

- Strike+: Deal 8 damage. Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

- Defend+: Gain 6 Block. If this card is discarded, gain 6 Block.

- Defect:

- Strike+: Deal 6 damage. (Costs 0 Energy)

- Defend+: Gain 7 Block. Draw 1 card.

- Watcher:

- Strike+: Deal 7 damage. Gain 2 Mantra.

- Defend+: Retain. Gain 6 Block.
